channel.title: Yelp on Gershom Tripp
channel.description: Recent content in Yelp on Gershom Tripp

item.title: Characterizing Berlin's Districts Through Yelp Data
item.description: Introduction What follows is an analysis of Yelp reviewed businesses in Berlin, Germany. It can broadly be broken up into two parts: The first part constitutes a general EDA where I explore the contours of the data and produce some basic statistics. The second part represents an attempt to describe each of Berlin’s 12 districts through “characteristic” businesses. This blogpost represents a couple of firsts. For one, it is the product of of my very first foray into the world of geospatial data, including maps, decimal degrees, dot density plots, choropleth maps (not included below, but coming soon), etc.
